name: S T A P L E
name_original: S T A P L E
description:
There are 10 big trees.  Staple bread to them all before the light runs out.  You can also staple little trees for bonus points.

You won't be able to move at first, click in the game window to start moving.

File Size is 68mb, so it should load fast.  

WASD - move

ESC - options menu

Left Click - staple

Hold Left Shift - run

KNOWN ISSUES

Stuttering in the beginning. This happens because every model is being loaded for the first time.
